meanings.definition: Arranged like a star with points radiating outwards.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks created a stellate pattern in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The stellate flower petals glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The stellate snowflake landed softly on the tip of his nose.
meanings.sent4: Her stellate necklace sparkled like a constellation around her neck.
meanings.sent5: The stellate design on the ceiling made the room feel magical.

meanings.sent1: The cake was decorated with stellate sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: The crystal chandelier cast a stellate shadow on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The stellate cookies were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her stellate earrings shimmered under the lights.
meanings.sent5: The stellate pattern on the rug added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: Shaped like a star with multiple points or branches.
meanings.sent1: The stellate sea creature moved gracefully through the water.
meanings.sent2: The tree had stellate leaves that rustled in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The stellate snowflake landed softly on the tip of his nose.
meanings.sent4: The stellate cracks in the ice formed a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The stellate branches of the tree reached towards the sky.
